title: ChatControl: EU wants to scan all private messages, even in encrypted apps
author: Metalhearf
aiHeadline: EU wants to peek into your private chats, because what's the point of end-to-end encryption if they can't read your 'I love you' messages?

title: Microsoft blocks Israelâ€™s use of its tech in mass surveillance of Palestinians
author: helsinkiandrew
aiHeadline: Microsoft takes a stand against surveillance, because nothing says 'we care about privacy' like selling AI to the NSA.

title: Death rates rose in hospital ERs after private equity firms took over
author: coloneltcb
aiHeadline: Private equity proves once again that if you can't make money off death, you're not trying hard enough.

title: Cloudflare Email Service: private beta
author: tosh
aiHeadline: Because the world really needed another email service, Cloudflare is now your new email provider. Now you can have your emails and your DNS both fail at the same time!

title: The story of DOGE, as told by federal workers
author: rendx
aiHeadline: Federal workers, the people who brought you the IRS and the DMV, now bring you the definitive history of Dogecoin. Because who better to explain a joke than people who don't get them?
